titles.title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to allow children who meet certain criteria to attend a school that receives funds under part A of title I of such Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 2/12/1997--Introduced. Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to allow children who attend a school that does not receive targeted assistance school funds under part A of title I of such Act, but who meet certain criteria for disadvantaged students, to attend a school that receives such funds.
